title: Payment API Throwing 500 Errors
description: Payment processing API returning 500 internal server errors for all payment transactions. Started about 20 minutes ago during high traffic. Database connection appears to be timing out.

title: Data Service Memory Leak Issue
description: Background data processing service showing continuous memory growth. Service crashes every 2 days. Memory profiling shows objects not being garbage collected properly.

title: SSL Certificate About to Expire
description: SSL certificate for api.company.com will expire in 5 days. Auto-renewal failed last night. Need immediate action to prevent service interruption.

title: Redis Memory Usage Critical
description: Redis cluster memory at 90% capacity. Performance degradation observed. Cache eviction happening frequently affecting response times.

title: MongoDB Replication Delay
description: Secondary MongoDB nodes lagging 400 seconds behind primary. Read operations showing stale data. Network between nodes seems slow.

title: Kubernetes Worker Node Memory Issues
description: Worker node showing memory pressure warnings. Pods being evicted automatically. System OOM killer active. Need to address resource allocation.

title: ElasticSearch Cluster Health Yellow
description: Search cluster showing yellow health status. Some shards are unassigned. Index performance degraded. Cluster needs rebalancing.

title: Build Pipeline Breaking
description: CI/CD pipeline builds failing consistently. Dependency resolution errors. Version conflicts detected in package manager. Blocking deployments.

title: API Users Getting Rate Limited
description: Multiple API clients reporting 429 Too Many Requests errors during business hours. Current rate limits may be too aggressive for legitimate usage patterns.

title: Database Backup Failing
description: Nightly backup jobs not completing successfully. Storage full errors in logs. Need to clean up old backups or add capacity.

title: Log Pipeline Lagging
description: Log ingestion showing 20 minute delays. Events not appearing in monitoring dashboard in real-time. Processing pipeline appears bottlenecked.

title: DNS Resolution Timeout in Cluster
description: Services experiencing intermittent DNS failures within Kubernetes. CoreDNS pods under high load. Timeout errors in application logs.

title: RabbitMQ Message Backlog Growing
description: Message queue showing 100K+ unprocessed messages. Consumer processing too slow. Queue depth increasing continuously.

title: WebSocket Disconnecting Frequently
description: Real-time connections dropping every few minutes. Users reporting chat messages not sending. Load balancer timeout suspected.

title: Analytics Service High CPU
description: Analytics processing service consuming 95% CPU constantly. Report generation very slow. Query optimization needed.

title: Large File Upload Timing Out
description: File uploads over 50MB failing with timeout errors. S3 multipart upload not working properly. Users cannot upload large documents.

title: JWT Token Validation Failing
description: Authentication tokens being rejected randomly. JWT signature validation errors in logs. Clock synchronization issue suspected between auth servers.

title: GraphQL API Performance Issue
description: Complex GraphQL queries taking over 45 seconds. N+1 query problem causing database overload. Need to optimize resolvers and add DataLoader.

title: CDN Cache Not Working
description: Origin servers receiving all traffic directly. CDN cache hit rate dropped to 20%. Cache invalidation rules may be too aggressive.

title: User Session Logout Issues
description: Users being randomly logged out. Session token expiration happening prematurely. Redis session store showing connection errors.
